rev.desc.rev.desc: Data cleansing rename record can't be merge
update panel default, handle number type fields
refactoring the field select logic, get the first character-typed fieldnames for all the unique keys to rename.
Pulled out the panel uimpages, and the decision exit to this panel.
Merge tool could not be used for some records
Added processing for the settingsConfig table to prefix the setting and id fields.
Added processing for the Workflow table to prefix the name and tableName fields.
Added processing for the WorkflowPhase table to prefix the phaseName, workflowName and tableName fields.
Removed processing for uim# tables, with the exception of uimpages and uimcompdefinitions.
Removed prefixing of the service.request.id field in the svcCatInterface table since this is now in the Exclusion field for signaturing (and it's the field in the counters record).
Updated the uim panel to include adding 1000 to the numeric id field for the MySM tables.
Updated the uim# panels to make sure the field getting prefixed is a character type field (not a number field).
Updated the extaccess panel to make sure BOTH fields that make up the unique key of the extaccess table are prefixed during renaming.
Added handling for the kmprofile table. The id and name fields should be prefixed.
Added handling for the svcCatInterface table. The interface.name and service.request.id fields should be prefixed.
Added handling for the activitytype table. The table field should be prefixed.
Added handling for the kmgroup table. The id and name fields should be prefixed.
Added handling for the kmdoctype table. The name field should be prefixed.
Added handling for the notification table. The name and id fields should be prefixed.
Added new special handling for the extaccess table. The object.name field should be prefixed.
